metadata.title: Sediment Heavy Metal Data Sources for the Bering and Chukchi Sea.

creators.name: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), Alaska Biological Science Center, Marine

metadata.description: An annotated bibliography of sediment heavy metal data sources for the Bering and Chukchi Seas.  The index includes references to journal articles, agency reports, maps and raw data.  Important characteristics of data sources are identified: geographic extent, elements sampled, extraction and analysis methods, depth of sample in sediment, number of sampling stations and availability of station coordinates.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: ABSC is building this database to determine the geographic extent of sediment heavy metal data and evaluate its suitability for use in marine animal research.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: As Needed

Access constraints: None
